snippet.title: Microsoft Flight Simulator - Dune Expansion Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
In a groundbreaking collaboration with Legendary Pictures and Warner Bros. Entertainment, Xbox and Microsoft Flight Simulator are immersing gamers in the captivating world of Arrakis in the Dune Expansion – available today! 

For the first time ever, Microsoft Flight Simulator is taking you beyond Planet Earth into the harsh deserts of the world of “Dune” and the planet Arrakis. Aviators can put their courage and skills to the test in the cockpit of the Royal Atreides Ornithopter, mastering tutorials, time trials, and a daring rescue mission.

See DUNE: PART TWO in theaters on March 1st and play the expansion now.

Microsoft Flight Simulator is available for Xbox Series X|S and Windows PCs with Xbox Game Pass and PC Game Pass, and for Xbox One and the devices you already have via Xbox Cloud Gaming: 

https://www.xbox.com/games/microsoft-flight-simulator

SUBSCRIBE TO XBOX: https://xbx.lv/2EEjmaR 

FOLLOW XBOX 
https://twitter.com/xbox 
https://www.facebook.com/xbox 
https://www.instagram.com/xbox/ 
https://www.tiktok.com/@xbox
